title: Project structure and configuration
notes: Created llm_trading_lab/ structure, config.py, and updated repo artifacts

title: MarketDataSource base class and Binance connector
notes: Implemented data_sources module with MarketDataSource interface and Binance WebSocket connector

title: Optional data connectors (Alpaca, Manifold, StockData)
notes: Implemented optional data sources as placeholders for stocks, prediction markets, and low-frequency equities

title: Paper broker and execution engine
notes: Implemented models.py, broker.py with order execution and position tracking

title: SQLite storage layer
notes: Implemented storage.py for logging trades and equity snapshots

title: Bot API and dynamic loader
notes: Implemented BotContext and bot manager for dynamic Python bot loading

title: Main event loop and CLI monitor
notes: Implemented main.py event loop and monitor.py CLI dashboard

title: End-to-end testing with live data
notes: Verified system starts successfully, loads bots, and handles graceful shutdown. Live data connection works (tested in restricted network environment)
